data.eml:eml: A new genus and new species of deep-water trapeziid crab (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura: Trapezioidea) from the Ryukyu Islands, Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Komai, Tomoyuki, Higashiji, Takuo, Castro, Peter (2010): A new genus and new species of deep-water trapeziid crab (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura: Trapezioidea) from the Ryukyu Islands, Japan. Zootaxa 2555: 62-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.196907
